forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 17C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 62F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening followed by increasing clouds with showers developing after midnight. Low around 10C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will give way to occasional showers overnight. Low near 50F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with mostly cloudy conditions later in the day. High 17C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 62F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 9C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Abundant sunshine. High 16C. Winds NNW at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny. High near 60F. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 48F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny. High 16C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly sunny. High 61F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 11C. Winds light and variable.
